Package com.cyc.base.connection

Lower-level communications interfaces; this code is not supported for external developers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CycConnection
    Defines the interface for local and remote CycConnection objects
    LeaseManager  
    LeaseManager.LeaseEventObject
    Class that provides a Cyc lease event.
    LeaseManager.LeaseManagerListener
    Defines the interface for Cyc API services event listeners.
    Timer  
    Worker
    Worker is designed to provide a handle for a particular communication event with a Cyc server.
    Worker.NotificationTask  
    WorkerEvent  
    WorkerEvent.EventType  
    WorkerListener
    This interface is one that must be implemented by anyone wishing to listen in on events generated by a SublWorker.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LeaseManager.LeaseManagerReason
    Class to contain the Cyc lease manager event reason
    WorkerStatus
    WorkerStatus is designed to be a type-safe enumeration of the status of a SublWorker.

Package com.cyc.base.connection Description

Lower-level communications interfaces; this code is not supported for external developers.
